metadata.title: CVE-2022-33064 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An off-by-one error in function wav_read_header in src/wav.c in Libsndfile1.1.0, results in a write out of bound, which allows an attacker to executearbitrary code, Denial of Service or other unspecified impacts.

criterions.comment: libsndfile package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2024-09-19').
